channel.title: Security on Franks.codes
channel.description: Recent content in Security on Franks.codes

item.title: The Spring Security Oauth2 Blues - Simplicity
item.description: I personally like the Spring Framework and its security components, because it’s pretty full-featured and easy to use, but when it comes to Spring Security OAuth2, there’s a huge quality breakdown. In this (probably series) of blogposts, I’ll try to sum up the good, the bad, the evil and why I ended up completely dropping Spring Security OAuth2.
